Package com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl

Class TransactionDAOMariaDB

java.lang.Object
com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl.TransactionDAOMariaDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Transaction>, TransactionDAO
public class TransactionDAOMariaDB extends Object implements TransactionDAO
Transaction DAO implementation for MariaDB. Has methods needed by services to access persistence layer.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

      public int changeUserBalance(int userId, BigDecimal difference, String description) throws DAOException

      Parameters:

    • chargeUserForTariffUsing

      public int chargeUserForTariffUsing(int userId, int tariffId, String description) throws DAOException
      This method modify User table's balance field by decreasing it by rate of the Tariff(tariffId) and add transaction about these changes.
      Specified by:
      chargeUserForTariffUsing in interface TransactionDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose balance needs to be decreased.
      tariffId - The ID of the Tariff for which to charge.
      description - Description of the transaction to be added.
      Returns:
      Rows changed.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is thrown when SQLException occurs.
